title: Key West Brewfest
seo_description: Brewfest is back and it’s bigger and better than ever! It’s hard to believe Key West Brewfest is celebrating its 7th year. The festivities take place over Labor Day Weekend, September 1st – September 5th in beautiful Florida Keys. The Marker Resort will be hosting a Kona Brewery Pool Party on Sunday, September 4th from 1pm - 4pm!
